data.title: Rashid Latif Medical Complex
meta_keywords: private medical colleges fees in pakistan
data.meta_description: Rashid Latif Medical Complex (RLMC), established in 2010, is a private college of Medical, Dental, Pharmacy, Health Sciences, Physical Therapy, Nursing, Paramedical in Lahore Pakistan.
data.text:
Rashid Latif Medical College (RLMC) was established in 2010 on a purpose-built campus spanning 28 acres of land on Ferozepur Road, Lahore. RLMC holds recognition from the Pakistan Medical and Dental Council (PMDC) and is affiliated with the University of Health Sciences (UHS). The college annually admits 150 MBBS students and boasts advanced laboratories, a well-equipped library, an e-library, highly qualified teaching faculty, a spacious auditorium with 650 seats, a sports complex including a cricket ground, and an adjacent 760-bed Arif Memorial Teaching Hospital. Additionally, the college provides separate on-campus accommodation for female and male students

Rashid Latif Medical College

Rashid Latif Dental College, established in 2017, is a prestigious institution approved by the Pakistan Medical and Dental Council (PMDC) in 2018. It is affiliated with the University of Health Sciences. Rashid Latif Dental College provides excellent learning environment for its students. The college admits 75 students annually. With over 100 dental units and a dental skill lab equipped with 25 phantom head units, it provides state-of-the-art facilities for practical training. Additionally, the college is attached to Arif Memorial Teaching Hospital for Medical Sciences, which boasts more than 600 beds, allowing students to gain practical experience in a clinical setting.

Rashid Latif Dental College

Rashid Latif college of Pharmacy was established in 2013. The college offers Doctor of Pharmacy degree. It is accredited by Pharmacy Council of Pakistan and is affiliated with the University of Sargodha. The college has state of the art infrastructure and well equipped laboratories. The college has highly educated and experienced M. Phil and PhD faculty. RLCP student’s clinical training is done in 760 beds Arif Memorial teaching hospital.

Rashid Latif College of Pharmacy

After successfully establishing Rashid Latif Medical College, Nursing School and Paramedical College, Rashid Latif Institute of Allied Health Sciences is being launched with 6 above mentioned programs in Allied health Sciences from 2013. Health care opportunities are not just limited to doctors. In addition to physicians, there are allied health professionals and their combined expertise that spans many areas of health care.

Rashid Latif Institute of Allied Health Sciences

Rashid Latif College of physical therapy (RLCPT) was established in 2014 on Ferozepur Road, Lahore. RLCPT is affiliated with the University of Health Sciences (UHS). The college admits 60 DPT students annually. It has well equipped laboratories, well stocked library, and highly qualified teaching faculty. The clinical training is done in adjacent 760-bed Arif Memorial Teaching Hospital and 350 beds Hameed Latif Hospital Additionally, the college provides separate on-campus accommodation for female and male students.

Rashid Latif College of Physical Therapy

Rashid Latif Nursing College was established in 2010 with the aim to produce competent, caring and compassionate nurses. We offer 4 years BS-Nurisng degree and 2 years Certified Nurisng Assistant Program. RLNC is registered with Pakistan Nursing and Midwifery Council, Nursing Examination Board Punjab, and affiliated with University of Health Sciences Lahore. Our nursing students get their clinical training from Arif Memorial Teaching Hospital, a 740 bedded Tertiary Care Hospital, and Hameed Latif Hospital, a 350 bedded teaching hospital.

Rashid Latif Nursing College

Arif Memorial Paramedical College started its journey in 2012 under the umbrella of Rashid Latif Medical Complex. The Paramedical college is fully geared to meet the challenge and demand of professionals by gradually reducing the gap between the demand and supply and continuously producing top-grade specialists stemming from a quality education.

Arif Memorial Paramedical College

Rashid Latif Medical Complex is comprised of multiple healthcare institutions. This complex’s origins stem back to the establishment of The Rashid Latif Medical College, affiliated with the University of Health Sciences in 2010, which went on to further host a gross amount of one hundred students in its first batch of MBBS.

Our teaching hospital, The Arif Memorial Hospital is built on 28 acres of land on the Main Ferozpur Road, Lahore. An ISO 9001:2008 certified hospital in its 9th year of operations, it is recognized by CPSP for post-graduate training in the fields of surgery, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Pediatrics and Ophthalmology as well as all theoretical fields of Medicine.

RLMC Vision

“To become the Centre of excellence in the field of Health Sciences.”

RLMC Mission

Groom competent professionals who are outstanding clinicians and investigators with a passion for lifelong learning and providing the highest quality compassionate care and are sensitive to the needs of the community.

Provision of quality education in medicine and its related fields through effective teaching methods and techniques.

To keep abreast with latest developments and research from across the globe and strive to become a center for advancement for medical profession.

Develop clinicians who are trained to become future leaders in the field of medicine. Our graduates will uphold the dignity of their profession, practice both the art and science of medicine with altruism and incorporate the highest ethical principles into their life and practice.

To promote practice of evidence based Medicine.
